Cor.</TITLE> <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1679</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>, <PLACE>Jenæ</PLACE> <YEAR>1727</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Walchn</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE> <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE> <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE> <YEAR>1733</YEAR>. <VOLUME>II. Tomi</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE> von <VOLUME>50. Carten</VOLUME></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"I made the following corrections to the XML:
1. Fixed special characters: Replaced "Augustiner-Ga\u221a\u00fc" with "Augustiner-Gaße"
2. Fixed special characters: Replaced "sch\u221a\u2202nen" with "schönen"
3. Fixed special characters: Replaced "Jen\u221a\u00a7" with "Jenæ"
4. Fixed special characters: Replaced "4t\u221a\u2264" with "4to"
5. Fixed special characters: Replaced "Frantz\u221a\u2202sischer" with "Französischer"
6. Fixed format tag: Added missing format tag in the 4th bibliography item "<FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>"
7. Fixed TITLE tag: Corrected syntax error in the Clericus item from "<TITLE=" to "<TITLE>" and fixed the ampersand by replacing "&" with "&"

Additionally, I normalized Roman numerals: Changed "IT. Tomes" to "II. Tomes" and "11. Tomi" to "II. Tomi" as these likely represent the number 2 in roman numerals."}

parsed.explanation:
I made the following corrections to the XML:
1. Fixed special characters: Replaced "Augustiner-Ga\u221a\u00fc" with "Augustiner-Gaße"
2. Fixed special characters: Replaced "sch\u221a\u2202nen" with "schönen"
3. Fixed special characters: Replaced "Jen\u221a\u00a7" with "Jenæ"
4. Fixed special characters: Replaced "4t\u221a\u2264" with "4to"
5. Fixed special characters: Replaced "Frantz\u221a\u2202sischer" with "Französischer"
6. Fixed format tag: Added missing format tag in the 4th bibliography item "<FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>"
7. Fixed TITLE tag: Corrected syntax error in the Clericus item from "<TITLE=" to "<TITLE>" and fixed the ampersand by replacing "&" with "&"

Additionally, I normalized Roman numerals: Changed "IT. Tomes" to "II. Tomes" and "11. Tomi" to "II. Tomi" as these likely represent the number 2 in roman numerals.
